00064 class YATE_API Flags32
00065 {
00066 public:
00070     inline Flags32()
00071         : m_flags(0)
00072         {}
00073 
00078     inline Flags32(u_int32_t value)
00079         : m_flags(value)
00080         {}
00081 
00086     inline u_int32_t flags() const
00087         { return m_flags; }
00088 
00093     inline void set(u_int32_t mask)
00094         { m_flags = m_flags | mask; }
00095 
00100     inline void reset(u_int32_t mask)
00101         { m_flags = m_flags & ~mask; }
00102 
00108     inline u_int32_t flag(u_int32_t mask) const
00109         { return (m_flags & mask); }
00110 
00116     inline void changeFlag(u_int32_t mask, bool on) {
00117             if (on)
00118                 set(mask);
00119             else
00120                 reset(mask);
00121         }
00122 
00129     inline bool changeFlagCheck(u_int32_t mask, bool ok) {
00130             if ((0 != flag(mask)) == ok)
00131                 return false;
00132             changeFlag(mask,ok);
00133             return true;
00134         }
00135 
00140     inline void change(u_int32_t value)
00141         { m_flags = value; }
00142 
00146     inline operator u_int32_t() const
00147         { return m_flags; }
00148 
00152     inline const Flags32& operator=(int value)
00153         { m_flags = value; return *this; }
00154 
00155 protected:
00156     u_int32_t m_flags;
00157 };

00163 class YATE_API NamedInt: public String
00164 {
00165     YCLASS(NamedInt,String)
00166 public:
00172     inline NamedInt(const char* name, int val = 0)
00173         : String(name), m_value(val)
00174         {}
00175 
00180     inline NamedInt(const NamedInt& other)
00181         : String(other), m_value(other.value())
00182         {}
00183 
00188     inline int value() const
00189         { return m_value; }
00190 
00195     inline void setValue(int val)
00196         { m_value = val; }
00197 
00203     static void addToListUniqueName(ObjList& list, NamedInt* obj);
00204 
00210     static void clearValue(ObjList& list, int val);
00211 
00219     static inline int lookup(const ObjList& list, const String& name, int defVal = 0) {
00220             ObjList* o = list.find(name);
00221             return o ? (static_cast<NamedInt*>(o->get()))->value() : defVal;
00222         }
00223 
00231     static inline const String& lookupName(const ObjList& list, int val,
00232         const String& defVal = String::empty()) {
00233             for (ObjList* o = list.skipNull(); o; o = o->skipNext()) {
00234                 NamedInt* ni = static_cast<NamedInt*>(o->get());
00235                 if (ni->value() == val)
00236                     return *ni;
00237             }
00238             return defVal;
00239         }
00240 
00241 protected:
00242     int m_value;
00243 
00244 private:
00245     NamedInt() {}
00246 };

00993 class YATE_API Client : public MessageReceiver
00994 {
00995     YCLASS(Client,MessageReceiver)
00996     friend class Window;
00997     friend class ClientChannel;
00998     friend class ClientDriver;
00999     friend class ClientLogic;
01000 public:
01004     enum MsgID {
01005         CallCdr = 0,
01006         UiAction,
01007         UserLogin,
01008         UserNotify,
01009         ResourceNotify,
01010         ResourceSubscribe,
01011         ClientChanUpdate,
01012         UserRoster,
01013         ContactInfo,
01014         // Handlers not automatically installed
01015         ChanNotify,
01016         MucRoom,
01017         // IDs used only to postpone messages
01018         MsgExecute,
01019         EngineStart,
01020         TransferNotify,
01021         UserData,
01022         FileInfo,
01023         // Starting value for custom relays
01024         MsgIdCount
01025     };
01026 
01030     enum ClientToggle {
01031         OptMultiLines = 0,               // Accept incoming calls
01032         OptAutoAnswer,                   // Auto answer incoming calls
01033         OptRingIn,                       // Enable/disable incoming ringer
01034         OptRingOut,                      // Enable/disable outgoing ringer
01035         OptActivateLastOutCall,          // Set the last outgoing call active
01036         OptActivateLastInCall,           // Set the last incoming call active
01037         OptActivateCallOnSelect,         // Set the active call when selected in channel
01038                                          //  list (don't require double click)
01039         OptKeypadVisible,                // Show/hide keypad
01040         OptOpenIncomingUrl,              // Open an incoming URL in call.execute message
01041         OptAddAccountOnStartup,          // Open account add window on startup
01042         OptDockedChat,                   // Show all contacts chat in the same window
01043         OptDestroyChat,                  // Destroy contact chat when contact is removed/destroyed
01044         OptNotifyChatState,              // Notify chat states
01045         OptShowEmptyChat,                // Display received empty chat in chat history
01046         OptSendEmptyChat,                // Send empty chat
01047         OptCount
01048     };
01049

02104 class YATE_API ClientChannel : public Channel
02105 {
02106     YCLASS(ClientChannel,Channel)
02107     friend class ClientDriver;
02108     YNOCOPY(ClientChannel); // no automatic copies please
02109 public:
02113     enum Notification {
02114         Startup,
02115         Destroyed,
02116         Active,
02117         OnHold,
02118         Mute,
02119         Noticed,
02120         AddrChanged,
02121         Routed,
02122         Accepted,
02123         Rejected,
02124         Progressing,
02125         Ringing,
02126         Answered,
02127         Transfer,
02128         Conference,
02129         AudioSet,
02130         Unknown
02131     };
02132 
02136     enum SlaveType {
02137         SlaveNone = 0,
02138         SlaveTransfer,
02139         SlaveConference,
02140     };
02141 
02147     ClientChannel(const Message& msg, const String& peerid);
02148 
02156     ClientChannel(const String& target, const NamedList& params, int st = SlaveNone,
02157         const String& masterChan = String::empty());
02158 
02163     explicit ClientChannel(const String& soundId);
02164 
02165     virtual ~ClientChannel();
02166 
02173     bool start(const String& target, const NamedList& params);
02174 
02175     virtual bool msgProgress(Message& msg);
02176     virtual bool msgRinging(Message& msg);
02177     virtual bool msgAnswered(Message& msg);
02178     virtual bool msgDrop(Message& msg, const char* reason);
02179     virtual bool callRouted(Message& msg);
02180     virtual void callAccept(Message& msg);
02181     virtual void callRejected(const char* error, const char* reason, const Message* msg);
02182 
02187     void callAnswer(bool setActive = true);
02188 
02193     inline int slave() const
02194         { return m_slave; }
02195 
02201     inline ObjList& slaves()
02202         { return m_slaves; }
02203 
02208     inline unsigned int slavesCount() const {
02209             Lock lock(m_mutex);
02210             return m_slaves.count();
02211         }
02212 
02217     inline void addSlave(const String& sid) {
02218             Lock lock(m_mutex);
02219             if (!m_slaves.find(sid))
02220                 m_slaves.append(new String(sid));
02221         }
02222 
02227     inline void removeSlave(const String& sid) {
02228             Lock lock(m_mutex);
02229             m_slaves.remove(sid);
02230         }
02231 
02236     inline const String& master() const
02237         { return m_master; }
02238 
02243     inline const NamedList& clientParams() const
02244         { return m_clientParams; }
02245 
02250     inline const String& party() const
02251         { return m_party; }
02252 
02257     inline const String& partyName() const
02258         { return m_partyName ? m_partyName : m_party; }
02259 
02264     inline bool conference() const
02265         { return m_conference; }
02266 
02271     inline const String& transferId() const
02272         { return m_transferId; }
02273 
02278     inline RefObject* clientData() const
02279         { return m_clientData; }
02280 
02286     inline void setClientData(RefObject* obj = 0) {
02287             TelEngine::destruct(m_clientData);
02288             if (obj && obj->ref())
02289                 m_clientData = obj;
02290         }
02291 
02298     bool setMedia(bool open = false, bool replace = false);
02299 
02306     bool setActive(bool active, bool update = true);
02307 
02314     bool setMuted(bool on, bool update = true);
02315

02322 
02328     void setConference(const String& target = String::empty());
02329 
02334     inline const String& peerOutFormat() const
02335         { return m_peerOutFormat; }
02336 
02341     inline const String& peerInFormat() const
02342         { return m_peerInFormat; }
02343 
02348     inline bool active() const
02349         { return m_active; }
02350 
02355     inline bool muted() const
02356         { return m_muted; }
02357 
02362     inline bool isNoticed() const
02363         { return m_noticed; }
02364 
02368     void noticed();
02369 
02374     inline int line() const
02375         { return m_line; }
02376 
02381     void line(int newLine);
02382 
02393     void update(int notif, bool chan = true,
02394         bool updatePeer = true, const char* engineMsg = 0,
02395         bool minimal = false, bool data = false);
02396 
02401     inline void getReconnPeer(String& buf) {
02402             Lock lck(m_mutex);
02403             buf = m_peerId;
02404         }
02409     inline bool hasReconnPeer()
02410         { return 0 != getReconnPeer(false); }
02411 
02417     CallEndpoint* getReconnPeer(bool ref = true);
02418 
02422     void dropReconnPeer(const char* reason = 0);
02423 
02430     static int lookup(const char* notif, int def = Unknown)
02431         { return TelEngine::lookup(notif,s_notification,def); }
02432 
02439     static const char* lookup(int notif, const char* def = 0)
02440         { return TelEngine::lookup(notif,s_notification,def); }
02441 
02448     static int lookupSlaveType(const char* notif, int def = SlaveNone)
02449         { return TelEngine::lookup(notif,s_slaveTypes,def); }
02450 
02454     static const TokenDict s_notification[];
02455 
02459     static const TokenDict s_slaveTypes[];
02460 
02461 protected:
02462     virtual void destroyed();
02463     virtual void connected(const char* reason);
02464     virtual void disconnected(bool final, const char* reason);
02465     // Check for a source in channel's peer or a received message's user data
02466     inline bool peerHasSource(Message& msg) {
02467             CallEndpoint* ch = getPeer();
02468             if (!ch)
02469                 ch = static_cast<CallEndpoint*>(msg.userObject(YATOM("CallEndpoint")));
02470             return ch && ch->getSource();
02471         }
02472     // Check if our consumer's source sent any data
02473     // Don't set the silence flag is already reset
02474     void checkSilence();
02475 
02476     int m_slave;                         // Slave type
02477     String m_master;                     // Master channel id
02478     String m_party;                      // Remote party
02479     String m_partyName;                  // Remote party name
02480     String m_peerOutFormat;              // Peer consumer's data format
02481     String m_peerInFormat;               // Peer source's data format
02482     String m_reason;                     // Termination reason
02483     String m_peerId;                     // Peer's id (used to re-connect)
02484     bool m_noticed;                      // Incoming channel noticed flag
02485     int m_line;                          // Channel's line (address)
02486     bool m_active;                       // Channel active flag
02487     bool m_silence;                      // True if the peer did't sent us any audio data
02488     bool m_conference;                   // True if this channel is in conference
02489     bool m_muted;                        // True if this channel is muted (no data source))
02490     String m_transferId;                 // Transferred id or empty if not transferred
02491     RefObject* m_clientData;             // Obscure data used by client logics
02492     bool m_utility;                      // Regular client channel flag
02493     String m_soundId;                    // The id of the sound to play
02494     ObjList m_slaves;                    // Data managed by the default logic
02495     NamedList m_clientParams;            // Channel client parameters
02496 };

03160             const String& dir = params[YSTRING("direction")];
03161             if (dir == YSTRING("incoming"))

03163             if (dir == YSTRING("outgoing"))

04346 class YATE_API ClientContact : public RefObject
04347 {

04350     YNOCOPY(ClientContact); // no automatic copies please
04351 public:
04355     enum Subscription {
04356         SubFrom = 0x01,
04357         SubTo = 0x02,
04358     };
04359 
04367     explicit ClientContact(ClientAccount* owner, const char* id, const char* name = 0,
04368         const char* uri = 0);
04369 
04378     explicit ClientContact(ClientAccount* owner, const NamedList& params, const char* id = 0,
04379         const char* uri = 0);
04380 
04385     inline ClientAccount* account()
04386         { return m_owner; }
04387

04393         { return m_owner ? m_owner->toString() : String::empty(); }
04394 
04399     inline const URI& uri() const
04400         { return m_uri; }
04401

04407         { m_uri = u; }
04408 
04413     inline const String& subscriptionStr() const
04414         { return m_subscription; }
04415 
04420     inline bool subscriptionFrom() const
04421         { return 0 != m_sub.flag(SubFrom); }
04422 
04427     inline bool subscriptionTo() const
04428         { return 0 != m_sub.flag(SubTo); }
04429 
04435     bool setSubscription(const String& value);
04436

04442         { return m_resources; }
04443

04449         { return m_online || 0 != m_resources.skipNull(); }
04450

04456         { m_online = on; }

04463         { return m_groups; }

04471         { return m_params.getBoolValue(YSTRING("local"),defVal); }

04478         { m_params.setParam("local",String::boolText(on)); }

04486         { return m_params.getBoolValue(YSTRING("remote"),defVal); }
04487 
04492     inline void setRemote(bool on)
04493         { m_params.setParam("remote",String::boolText(on)); }
04494 
04499     inline void setDockedChat(bool on) {
04500             if (!mucRoom())
04501                 m_dockedChat = on;
04502         }
04503 
04508     inline void getContactSection(String& buf) {
04509             String pref;
04510             buf = toString();
04511             buf.startSkip(buildContactId(pref,accountName(),String::empty()),false);
04512             buf = buf.uriUnescape();
04513         }
04514 
04519     virtual const String& toString() const
04520         { return m_id; }
04521 
04526     virtual MucRoom* mucRoom()
04527         { return 0; }
04528

04536         { return buildContactInstanceId(dest,m_id,inst); }
04537 
04543     inline void buildIdHash(String& buf, const String& prefix = String::empty()) {
04544             MD5 md5(m_id);
04545             buf = prefix + md5.hexDigest();
04546         }

04848     static inline String& buildContactId(String& dest, const String& account,
04849         const String& contact) {
04850             dest << account.uriEscape('|') << "|" << String::uriEscape(contact,'|').toLower();
04851             return dest;
04852         }
04853 
04859     static inline void splitContactId(const String& src, String& account) {
04860             int pos = src.find('|');
04861             if (pos >= 0)
04862                 account = src.substr(0,pos).uriUnescape();
04863             else
04864                 account = src.uriUnescape();
04865         }
04866 
04874     static void splitContactInstanceId(const String& src, String& account,
04875         String& contact, String* instance = 0);
04876 
04884     static inline String& buildContactInstanceId(String& dest, const String& cId,
04885         const String& inst = String::empty()) {
04886             dest << cId << "|" << inst.uriEscape('|');
04887             return dest;
04888         }
04889 
04890     // Chat window prefix
04891     static String s_chatPrefix;
04892     // Docked chat window name
04893     static String s_dockedChatWnd;
04894     // Docked chat widget name
04895     static String s_dockedChatWidget;
04896     // MUC rooms window name
04897     static String s_mucsWnd;
04898     // Chat input widget name
04899     static String s_chatInput;
04900 
04901     String m_name;                       // Contact's display name
04902     NamedList m_params;                  // Optional contact extra params
04903 
04904 protected:
04911     explicit ClientContact(ClientAccount* owner, const char* id, bool mucRoom);
04912 
04916     void removeFromOwner();
04917 
04921     virtual void destroyed();
04922 
04923     ClientAccount* m_owner;              // The account owning this contact
04924     bool m_online;                       // Online flag
04925     String m_id;                         // The contact's id
04926     String m_subscription;               // Presence subscription state
04927     Flags32 m_sub;                       // Subscription flags
04928     URI m_uri;                           // The contact's URI
04929     ObjList m_resources;                 // The contact's resource list
04930     ObjList m_groups;                    // The group(s) this contact belongs to
04931     bool m_dockedChat;                   // Docked chat flag
04932     String m_chatWndName;                // Chat window name if any
04933     NamedList m_share;                   // List of files and folders we share
04934     ObjList m_shared;                    // List of shared. Each entry is a ClientDir whose name is the resource
04935 };
04936 
04941 class YATE_API ClientResource : public RefObject
04942 {
04943     YCLASS(ClientResource,RefObject)
04944     YNOCOPY(ClientResource); // no automatic copies please
04945 public:
04949     enum Status {
04950         Unknown = 0,
04951         Offline = 1,
04952         Connecting = 2,
04953         Online = 3,
04954         Busy = 4,
04955         Dnd = 5,
04956         Away = 6,
04957         Xa = 7,
04958     };
04959 
04963     enum Capability {
04964         CapAudio = 0x00000001,           // Audio
04965         CapFileTransfer = 0x00000002,    // File transfer support
04966         CapFileInfo = 0x00000004,        // File info share support
04967         CapRsm = 0x00000008,             // Result set management support
04968     };
04969 
04976     inline explicit ClientResource(const char* id, const char* name = 0, bool audio = true)
04977         : m_id(id), m_name(name ? name : id), m_caps(audio ? CapAudio : 0),
04978         m_priority(0), m_status(Offline)
04979         { }
04980 
04985     virtual const String& toString() const
04986         { return m_id; }
04987 
04992     inline bool online() const
04993         { return m_status > Connecting; }
04994 
04999     inline bool offline() const
05000         { return m_status == Offline; }
05001 
05006     inline const char* statusName() const
05007         { return lookup(m_status,s_statusName); }
05008 
05013     inline const char* text() const
05014         { return m_text ? m_text.c_str() : statusDisplayText(m_status); }
05015 
05020     inline Flags32& caps()
05021         { return m_caps; }
05022 
05028     inline bool setAudio(bool ok)
05029         { return m_caps.changeFlagCheck(CapAudio,ok); }
05030 
05036     inline bool setFileTransfer(bool ok)
05037         { return m_caps.changeFlagCheck(CapFileTransfer,ok); }
05038 
05044     inline bool setPriority(int prio) {
05045             if (m_priority == prio)
05046                 return false;
05047             m_priority = prio;
05048             return true;
05049         }
05050 
05056     inline bool setStatus(int stat) {
05057             if (m_status == stat)
05058                 return false;
05059             m_status = stat;
05060             return true;
05061         }
05062 
05068     inline bool setStatusText(const String& text = String::empty()) {
05069             if (m_text == text)
05070                 return false;
05071             m_text = text;
05072             return true;
05073         }
05074 
05081     static inline const char* statusDisplayText(int status, const char* defVal = 0)
05082         { return lookup(status,s_statusName,defVal); }
05083 
05087     static const TokenDict s_statusName[];
05088 
05092     static const TokenDict s_resNotifyCaps[];
05093 
05094     String m_id;                         // The resource id
05095     String m_name;                       // Resource display name
05096     Flags32 m_caps;                      // Resource capabilities
05097     int m_priority;                      // Resource priority
05098     int m_status;                        // Resource status

05107 class YATE_API MucRoomMember : public ClientResource
05108 {
05109     YCLASS(MucRoomMember,ClientResource)
05110     YNOCOPY(MucRoomMember); // no automatic copies please
05111 public:
05115     enum Affiliation {
05116         AffUnknown = 0,
05117         AffNone,
05118         Outcast,
05119         Member,
05120         Admin,
05121         Owner
05122     };
05123 
05127     enum Role {
05128         RoleUnknown = 0,
05129         RoleNone,                        // No role (out of room)
05130         Visitor,                         // Can view room chat
05131         Participant,                     // Can only send chat
05132         Moderator                        // Room moderator: can kick members
05133     };
05134 
05141     inline explicit MucRoomMember(const char* id, const char* nick, const char* uri = 0)
05142         : ClientResource(id,nick),
05143         m_uri(uri), m_affiliation(AffNone), m_role(RoleNone)
05144         {}
05145 
05149     static const TokenDict s_affName[];
05150 
05154     static const TokenDict s_roleName[];
05155 
05156     String m_uri;                        // Member uri, if known
05157     String m_instance;                   // Member instance, if known
05158     int m_affiliation;                   // Member affiliation to the room
05159     int m_role;                          // Member role when present in room ('none' means not present)
05160 };

05208         { return m_resource->toString() == item; }

05215             return m_resource->online() &&
05216                 m_resource->m_role > MucRoomMember::RoleNone;
05217         }

05224         { return available() && m_resource->m_role >= MucRoomMember::Visitor; }
05225 
05230     inline bool canChatPrivate() const
05231         { return available(); }

05238         { return available() && m_resource->m_role == MucRoomMember::Moderator; }

05269             return m;
05270         }

05941 class YATE_API ClientFile: public ClientFileItem

05944 public:

05951         : ClientFileItem(name), m_params("") {
05952             if (params)
05953                 m_params.copyParams(*params);
05954         }
05955 
05960     inline ClientFile(const ClientFile& other)
05961         : ClientFileItem(other.name()), m_params(other.params())

05969         { return m_params; }
